Title: Reptilicus
Genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Sidney W. Pink (original story), Ib Melchior (screenplay), Sidney W. Pink (screenplay)
Actors: Bent Mejding, Asbjørn Andersen, Povl Wøldike, Ann Smyrner
Plot: A portion of the tail of a prehistoric reptile is discovered in Denmark. It regenerates into the entire reptile, which proceeds to destroy buildings and property and generally make a nuisance of itself. It can fly, swim, and walk, and has impenetrable scales, which makes it difficult to kill.
